Local Icons.description: List of 3,776 free to use ROBLOX images saved locally on your computer, so no need to load an image from the web.

Wall Creator.description: Allows you to quickly create a wall or fence out of complex shapes in seconds!

Explorer Scanner.description: Displays a list of instances and information about them in a single, easy to understand, plugin widget.

Advanced Studio Camera.description: Allows you to change roblox's default studio camera features!

UI Corner Editor.description: Makes creating corner UI a lot simpler, and allows single sides / corners to be round while others are sharp.

UI Editor Settings.description: Allows you to enable / disable certain features of the Roblox UI Editor.

Measurement Converter.description: Way of converting real world units of measurement into studs.
